titleStmt.title: Acts and laws passed by the great and general court or assembly of Their Majesties province of the Massachussets-bay, in New England begun at Boston, the eighth day of June 1692, and continued by adjournment, unto Wednesday the twelfth day of October following : being the second sessions.
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. General Court.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
